title: How many carriers can I quote through your platform?
desc: You can quote from over 30 leading Canadian carriers including Sun Life, Manulife, Equitable Life, and Canada Lifeâ€”all in one place! Our platform simplifies multi-carrier quoting to help you save time and close business faster.

title: Do I need technical skills to use PolicyAdvisor eXchange?
desc: Not at all. The platform is designed for ease of use, with an intuitive interface and guided onboarding. Whether you're a solo broker or part of a large agency, getting started is simple.

title: How does pricing work? Are there any setup fees?
desc: We offer flexible pricing with no setup fees. You can start with a free trial and then choose a subscription plan that fits your brokerage's workflow.

title: How secure is my client data?
desc: We use enterprise-grade encryption and secure cloud infrastructure to safeguard your client data. Our platform is fully compliant with Canadian data privacy regulations.
